message.content:
cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.AI, cs.SI, cs.NE 

The paper discusses a reinforcement learning algorithm for solving optimal control problems, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG). The specific problem being addressed is the periodic reference tracking problem in a gene regulatory network, which involves control theory and systems engineering (cs.SY). The algorithm also involves the use of prior knowledge and explicit exploitation of periodicity, which could fall under the categories of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and signal processing (cs.SI). Finally, the use of reinforcement learning in control problems is a common application in the field of neural networks (cs.NE).
